channel.title: Posts on Hayden Roche
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Hayden Roche

item.title: Using CNNs to Alleviate Local Traffic
item.description: The 4th Ave Train Spotter is a piece of technology I helped develop with the good people at Cohub, a software company based out of Nashville, TN. My dad, Steve, and brother, Elliott, both help run the company. Cohub’s office is located in the Wedgewood-Houston neighborhood of Nashville, where railroad tracks cross over two roads, 4th Avenue and Chestnut Street. Several times a day, trains cross over these roads. Sometimes, the crossings are quick, while other times, the train can sit parked at the intersection for 45+ minutes, not letting any cars by.
